name: Charles' Mansion
description:
GAME:

Who says you can't take money with you when you die? Renowned and generous ultra billionaire, Charles, met an unexpected demise many decades prior. Now, with no heir or anyone else to take over his estate, his old mansion is being ransacked by a gang of no-good mobsters!

Armed with newly discovered boomerang ribs, help Charles take the fight straight to these goons and gain back what's rightfully his! But don't forget, you're a crumbling old skeleton. If any of those muscleheads catches you, you're done for!

Retrieve the keys to your old vault hidden around your mansion and hope you get to the good stuff before they do!

CONTROLS:

Move:  Arrow keys

Attack:  X

CREDITS:

All sounds effects in game are public domain, with the exception of a couple I made with bfxr awhile back. All music is provided under the CC BY 3.0 license and credits are as follows:

Title Screen by Michael Klier: https://opengameart.org/content/the-crypt

Game Theme by Wolfgang: https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-waltz-theme

Ending Theme by PlayOnLoop: https://opengameart.org/content/halloween-rocknroll-music-loop

I was originally going to work on this with a friend but the timing didn't work out on his end. He's still credited in-game as we bounced a lot of ideas around :P
